alert.note: Alert for Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 7:58AM CDT until July 18 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pettis County in central Missouri... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 758 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Green Ridge, or 8 miles southeast of Whiteman Air Force Base, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Smithton, Green Ridge and Sedalia Memorial Arpt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
